_meanings:
Standing in the way,
obstructing, opposing, hindering
(said by Pāṇini to be admissible
only in the Veda, but see the 
quotations given below); {#arTaparipaMTI#}
{#mahAnarAtiH#} <ls>Mu. 5</ls>; {#nABavizyamahaM tatra#} 
{#yadi tatparipaMTinI#} <ls>Māl. 9. 50</ls>; so  
<ls>Bv. 1. 62</ls>, <ls>Bg. 3. 34</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 107</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">1. 10.</ls>

{@--1@} An enemy, antagonist, 
opponent, a foe.
